item.title: Dual write
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn about dual write functionality in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations for bidirectional data integration between Dataverse and F&O apps. Covers synchronous/asynchronous modes and volume considerations.
